hadith.chapter: Afflictions and the End of the World - كتاب الفتن
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا محمد، حدثنا غندر، حدثنا شعبة، عن واصل، عن أبي وائل، عن عبد الله، وأحسبه، رفعه قال ‏"‏ بين يدى الساعة أيام الهرج، يزول العلم، ويظهر فيها الجهل ‏"‏‏.‏ قال أبو موسى والهرج القتل بلسان الحبشة‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Narrated `Abdullah: The Prophet said, "Near the establishment of the Hour, there will be the days of Al-Harj, and the religious knowledge will be taken away (vanish i.e. by the death of Religious scholars) and general ignorance will spread." Abu Musa said, "Al-Harj, in the Ethiopian language, means killing," Ibn Mas`ud added: I heard Allah's Apostle saying; (It will be) from among the most wicked people who will be living at the time when the Hour will be established."
